title: 烏鴉嘴
explain: 烏鴉嘴。也可以當動詞，表示「帶來壞運氣」
ex3: "Don’t say we’ll win for sure, you might jinx it"
tran3: 別說我們一定會贏，你可能會烏鴉嘴

title: 自費
ex1: You have to pay out of pocket
ex2: I had to pay for the repair out of pocket
ex3:
"The insurance won’t cover it,"
so you have to pay out of pocket
tran3: 保險不理賠，所以你得自己付錢

title: 哽咽
explain: 哽咽、說不出話（因為情緒激動、想哭）
ex2: She choked up when she talked about her family
ex3: "Don’t choke up, just take a deep breath and keep going"
tran3: 別緊張說不出話，深呼吸繼續下去

title: 退步
explain: 退步，失去原本擅長的能力或技巧
ex2:
“I used to cook really well,”
but I think I’ve lost my touch.
tran2: 我以前很會煮，但現在好像手藝退步了
ex3:
The magician messed up the trick
Maybe he’s losing his touch
tran3: 魔術師表演失誤了，可能技術退步了

title: 傷口上灑鹽
explain: 故意揭人痛處；在別人失敗或難過時，還刻意提醒或嘲笑，讓對方更難受
ex1: Don't rub it in my face.
ex2: She rubs it in his face.
tran2: 她在他失敗時故意揭他的痛處。
tran3: 他一直故意揭別人痛處。

title: 被綠了
ex1: I got cheated on last night.
ex2: He found out he got cheated on by his girlfriend
tran2: 他發現自己被女友劈腿了
ex3:
"If you get cheated on,"
it’s better to move on
tran3: 如果被劈腿了，最好的辦法就是往前走

title: 佔位子
explain: 幫人先佔位，暫時把座位留著，等人回來再坐。
ex1: Can you hold a seat for me?
tran1: 你可以幫我暫時留個位嗎？
ex2: I'll hold a seat for you.
ex3: Hold a seat, I'm almost there.

title: 顧一下包包
explain: 對某人或某事持續留意、注意或監視，確保沒出狀況，偶爾也指照顧或看護。
ex1: Keep an eye on my bag.
ex2: Can you keep an eye on this?
ex3: Keep an eye on the stove.

title: 贅肉
ex1: He’s got some flab on his arms
ex2: Don’t worry, everyone has a little flab
tran2: 別擔心，每個人都有一點贅肉
ex3: I need to lose the flab on my stomach
tran3: 我需要減掉肚子上的贅肉
